trans-unit.target: TEXT_HEAVNA508_01649_SEQ_00<tab>Judging from Cid's expression, he has news which he believes will please you.

TEXT_HEAVNA508_01649_SEQ_01<tab>Having calculated the precise direction of the beam of light, Wedge now knows the heading that will lead you to Azys Lla. And so, with Lucia's magitek armor safely stowed aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>, you at last resume your pursuit of the <var 1A 02 /var>Soleil<var 1A 01 /var>.
As the land of the Vanu disappears into the distance, Lucia reveals her true identity. She is Lucia goe Junius, Garlean defector, and sister to Livia sas Junius, whom you slew in battle. Sensing your discomfort, Lucia claims to hold no grudge against you─and given her recent performance in battle, Cid is more than happy to take her at her word.
Some hours later, your comrade's calculations are confirmed when the clouds part to reveal the floating isle of Azys Lla. Alas, your progress is halted soon after by a powerful energy barrier which threatens to tear the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> apart. Frustrated, Cid turns the airship around and sets course for Ishgard, lamenting the Allagans' knack for making the simplest of tasks so infernally bloody complicated.

TEXT_HEAVNA508_01649_SEQ_02<tab>The thought of repairing the <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var> yet again is enough to fill Cid with dread. On the other hand, any landing you can walk away from...
TEXT_HEAVNA508_01649_WEDGE_100_002<tab>I've done it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I've worked out which way they're headed! Whenever you're ready, we'll set course for Azys Lla!
TEXT_HEAVNA508_01649_LUCIA_100_003<tab>And what will we find at the end of the road...?
TEXT_HEAVNA508_01649_CID_000_000<tab>Lest you wonder, Wedge was able to calculate the heading indicated by the beam of light emitted by the key. If Azys Lla lies in that direction, we'll find it.
TEXT_HEAVNA508_01649_CID_000_001<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Soleil<var 1A 01 /var> may have a lead on us, but she's no <var 1A 02 /var>Enterprise<var 1A 01 /var>. We'll catch them─you'll see!
TEXT_HEAVNA508_01649_CID_000_010<tab>Ack! And we'd barely finished repairing the damage incurred during our skyfishing trip. On the other hand, any landing you can walk away from, as they say...
TEXT_HEAVNA508_01649_CID_000_011<tab>I can only presume the <var 1A 02 /var>Soleil<var 1A 01 /var> passed through the barrier unscathed. That would certainly explain why the Vanu called it a key...
TEXT_HEAVNA508_01649_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab>Cid's piloting under pressure was a marvel to behold─and may I never have the opportunity to do so again.
TEXT_HEAVNA508_01649_LUCIA_000_013<tab>What could be out there that would warrant the personal attention of the Emperor himself...?
TEXT_HEAVNA508_01649_WEDGE_000_014<tab>I wonder─does she have a name?
TEXT_HEAVNA508_01649_BIGGS_000_015<tab>Gods, just thinking about all the repairs we'll have to make is giving me a bleedin' headache...
